welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wanluan, Taiwan! Get ready to experience the charming and vibrant city known for its breathtaking scenery, delicious food, and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Wanluan has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pingtung Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pingtung Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaoshiung International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Kaoshiung International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'KIA Free WiFi' and completing a short registration process.
